fr.cnes.doi.server

Class DoiServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.Restlet
      • org.restlet.Component
        • fr.cnes.doi.server.DoiServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.restlet.Uniform

    public class DoiServer
extends org.restlet.Component
    DoiServer contains the configuration of this server and the methods to start/stop it.
    Author:
    Jean-Christophe Malapert (jean-christophe.malapert@cnes.fr)
